statements: SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, assistant_id FROM voice_assistant_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT command_text, timestamp FROM voice_assistant_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM voice_assistant_logs;
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM voice_assistant_logs WHERE command_text LIKE '%weather%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT assistant_id, COUNT(assistant_id) AS commands_count FROM voice_assistant_logs GROUP BY assistant_id ORDER BY commands_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM voice_assistant_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM timestamp)) AS avg_response_time FROM voice_assistant_logs WHERE user_id = 2 AND command_text LIKE '%music%';
SELECT * FROM voice_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT assistant_id, COUNT(*) AS total_commands FROM voice_logs GROUP BY assistant_id;
SELECT command, timestamp FROM voice_logs WHERE assistant_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM assistant_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Echo%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM voice_logs JOIN assistant_devices ON voice_logs.assistant_id = assistant_devices.assistant_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, assistant_id, command, timestamp FROM voice_logs WHERE assistant_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, assistant_id, device_name, location FROM assistant_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT id, assistant_id, MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp FROM voice_logs;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT assistant_id) AS unique_assistants FROM assistant_devices;
SELECT device_name, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM assistant_devices JOIN voice_logs ON assistant_devices.assistant_id = voice_logs.assistant_id GROUP BY device_name ORDER BY total_logs DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM voice_logs WHERE assistant_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, age FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT assistant_name, manufacturer FROM assistants ORDER BY assistant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM voice_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT utterance, response FROM voice_logs WHERE assistant_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM users WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT assistant_name, manufacturer FROM assistants WHERE assistant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM voice_logs WHERE utterance LIKE '%hello%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM assistant_logs;
SELECT log_id, user_id, timestamp FROM assistant_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, model FROM assistants WHERE manufacturer = 'Google';
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, sentiment_score, keyword FROM nlp_analysis ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM assistant_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, speech_text FROM assistant_logs WHERE speech_text LIKE '%hello%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT assistants.name, assistants.model, users.username FROM assistants JOIN users ON assistants.assistant_id = users.user_id ORDER BY assistants.name, users.username DESC;
SELECT * FROM nlp_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND keyword IN ('positive', 'happy') ORDER BY analysis_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT assistant_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM assistant_logs GROUP BY assistant_id HAVING log_count > 3 ORDER BY log_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM AssistantLogs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, command FROM AssistantLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM AssistantUsers WHERE assistant_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM AssistantDevices WHERE assistant_id = 2 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT command_name, created_at FROM AssistantCommands WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AssistantLogs ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT assistant_id, COUNT(*) FROM AssistantLogs GROUP BY assistant_id;
SELECT username, email FROM AssistantUsers WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT device_name, location FROM AssistantDevices WHERE location LIKE '%Living Room%';
SELECT command_name, created_at FROM AssistantCommands ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
